title: Potable Water Resupply in Arid Environment
description: A logistics officer must plan the production and distribution of potable water for a battalion operating in the desert.

tasks.description: Calculate the daily water requirement for the entire battalion based on personnel count and environmental factors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer accurately calculates the total daily water need.

tasks.description: Check the status and production rate of all available Reverse Osmosis Water Purification Units (ROWPUs).
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer determines they have enough production capacity to meet demand.

tasks.description: Create a distribution schedule to deliver water from the ROWPUs to all company positions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer creates an efficient schedule to ensure all soldiers receive their daily water supply.
